name: VR Triber Demo
detailed_description:
As indie game developers, we decided to upload the demo version of VR Triber after a year of exploration and practice，so as to collect great ideas about how to perfecting the game.
Thank you for your participation, we will listen to your opinion and present better works to you.
about_the_game:
As indie game developers, we decided to upload the demo version of VR Triber after a year of exploration and practice，so as to collect great ideas about how to perfecting the game.
Thank you for your participation, we will listen to your opinion and present better works to you.
short_description:
VR Triber is a VR online multiplayer social platform, where you can meet, communicate with and play with users from all over the world. You can also share your panorama with others to let them experience your world here.
So let's farewell to the human apathy in the smartphone era, and embrace your friends with both hands!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: CPU: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: CPU: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
